summary: Xiaomi, founded in 2010, focuses on smartphones, smart hardware, and IoT platforms. With a mission to create affordable, innovative products, Xiaomi has rapidly grown globally. Emphasizing technology and value, their strategies include redefining entrepreneurship and integrating the Internet with manufacturing. Xiaomi aims to lead in smart living and manufacturing advancements, impacting global lifestyles. The company envisions a future where innovation thrives, engineering excellence is celebrated, and smart manufacturing drives Chinese brands forward.
